comment._content: You have to be kidding?  A hundred thousand for this game?

comment.author: 47932995@N08
comment._content:
Believe it or not... this is NOT a stadium!  This is Brookside Park in Cleveland, Ohio, it is right next to the Cleveland Metroparks Zoo. It is a public park with baseball diamonds still in use today.  I used to play baseball there. 
...And YES, this was an AMATEUR game!

comment.author: 56642821@N07
comment._content: I love to see that America's favorite past time had as much support back then as it does now!
